content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for expressing interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To begin the discussion, let me start with a proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month. Now please share any counteroffer if you have one in mind. Remember, if we reach an agreement, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and to end the negotiation without agreement, I'll mention 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
